DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : INTERNATIONAL
DOC.TEXT: Ex-IMF Secretary-General Dies : Pierre-Paul Schweitzer , a former head of the International Monetary Fund and top official in French economic_policy , died Sunday , his family said.He was 81 . The cause and place of death were not disclosed . A member of the_French Resistance , Schweitzer survived a Nazi concentration_camp and went_on to a brilliant career in French and international finance after World_War_II . Through the 1950s and early ' 60s , Schweitzer served as the second vice governor of the Bank of France . In 1963 he began a 10-year stewardship of the IMF as secretary_general . His father ' s brother , Dr. Albert Schweitzer , won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1952 .
